
Reverse Engineering Tool for Java/Enterprise Java.

Perl - write me if you need...

It may be useful if you have a lot of undocumented source code.

A small portfolio & hobby project. Are you developing something like this ? - Write me please.

----

It allows to draw UML sequence-diagrams by using
[http://amateras.sourceforge.jp AmaterasUML]
(Eclipse plug-in for drawing UML diagrams).

Also you can use it without AmaterasUML, but only for generation html views of filtered program trace.

----

This project is based on 
[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tracing_%28software%29 Software tracing].

*Related & lovely projects:*

`MaintainJ` - non expensive and professional tool, http://maintainj.com/

Answers.com - [http://wiki.answers.com/Q/Is_there_any_tool_to_generate_sequence_diagram_for_a_complex_Java_application Tools to generate sequence diagram for Java]

`Relo`, an open source tool, http://relo.csail.mit.edu/

`CodeCity`, a really excellent tool, non-commercial use only (if you haven't a commercial version of Visual Smalltalk), http://www.inf.unisi.ch/phd/wettel/codecity.html

`AmaterasUML`, an open source tool, http://amateras.sourceforge.jp/cgi-bin/fswiki_en/wiki.cgi?page=AmaterasUML

`PlantUML` http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/

`UMLGraph` http://umlgraph.org/
